header.title: LA CYCLOMANCIE OU COMMENT LIBERER VOTRE PUISSANCE PSYCHIQUE
header.category: Western Esotericism, Practical Occultism, Mind Power

central_thesis: The central thesis of 'LA CYCLOMANCIE' is that every individual possesses dormant, 'prehistoric' psychic powers within their 'Auto-Conscient Primitif' (Primitive Self-Conscious Mind), which can be awakened and controlled through specific mental and physiological techniques. By mastering these hidden powers, one can achieve extraordinary feats, influence others, manipulate physical reality, enhance personal abilities, and attain wealth, success, and even extended youth, effectively performing 'miracles' through a 'scientific' magical system.

structure_content.chapter_title: PREMIERE LEÇON: Comment Faire Travailler pour vous le fantastique potentiel de Votre Auto-Conscient Primitif
structure_content.summary: Introduces the concept of the 'Auto-Conscient Primitif' as the instinctive, prehistoric mind, explaining its anatomical composition (ten parts of the brain) and how its powers have diminished in modern humans. It posits that these dormant psychic and muscular controls can be reawakened and consciously used for extraordinary achievements. It provides a three-step method for directing psychic power to any part of the body, leveraging the 'protoplasmic irritability' of nerves to transmit commands.

structure_content.chapter_title: DEUXIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer Votre Esprit Conscient, le Centre d'Enregistrement de Vos Sensations et le Centre de Contrôle de Vos Organes sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Focuses on improving the transmission of psychic commands. It teaches how to make the conscious mind 'feel' sensations more intensely than reality through psychic commands. Exercises aim to place sensory and organ control centers under psychic command, enabling control over pain, temperature, body weight, emotions, and physical functions like digestion and regular bowel habits.

structure_content.chapter_title: TROISIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer Votre Centre de Coordination des Muscles sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Explores the immense potential of the 'Centre de Coordination des Muscles.' It details how to free this center from conscious control to achieve explosive muscular power, endurance, and physical grace. It scientifically explains muscle coordination during lifting and describes how to enhance muscular performance and agility through psychic command, emphasizing the distinction between hysterical (negative) and conscious (positive) control.

structure_content.chapter_title: QUATRIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique Vos Obstructifs Points de Jonction des Nerfs
structure_content.summary: Addresses the 'nerve junction points' (synapses) as obstacles to rapid psychic command transmission. It introduces the 'Psychic Arc' (Arc Psychique) method to reduce this resistance, enhancing nerve conductivity and accelerating reflexes. Three types of Psychic Arcs are described (Psychic Arc, Irradiated Psychic Arc, Delayed Psychic Arc) for various applications like quickly learning new skills, gaining sympathy, and overcoming negative thoughts.

structure_content.chapter_title: CINQUIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer l'Electricité Nerveuse de Votre Cerveau et de Votre Corps sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Explains the dynamic potential of 'nerve electricity' in the brain and body. It differentiates nerve electricity from cable electricity and describes its properties. The lesson delves into 'non-saturated control links' (association fibers) in the brain, emphasizing their role in human intelligence and manual dexterity. It teaches how to quickly form new 'cerebral links' for faster learning and to place one's 'personality' under psychic control.

structure_content.chapter_title: SIXIEME LEÇON: Comment Multiplier Votre Energie Grâce au Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Explains how to multiply physical and mental energy. It introduces the 'Stimulating Respiration' technique for deep, rhythmic breathing to increase oxygen intake and eliminate carbon dioxide, thereby boosting energy and mental clarity. It describes the 'Horizontal Ozona' method for rapid energy recovery when tired, focusing on deep breathing in a relaxed, supine position to recharge the body with 'electrons' from the atmosphere.

structure_content.chapter_title: SEPTIEME LEÇON: Comment ne 'JAMAIS ETRE FATIGUE' en Plaçant Votre Tonus Musculaire sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Focuses on maintaining physical fitness and preventing fatigue by controlling muscle tone. It explains how to achieve 'miraculous muscular endurance' through psychic control, emphasizing rhythmic exercises and the complete relaxation of muscles. The lesson introduces the 'Zembla Accroupi' (Squatting Zembla) and 'Zembla Assis' (Sitting Zembla) postures for maximizing lung capacity, delaying aging, and maintaining constant energy. It also teaches 'Selective Muscular Tone Control' for precise physical actions and overcoming clumsiness.

structure_content.chapter_title: HUITIEME LEÇON: Comment Utiliser le Stupéfiant Pouvoir des Cornes de Votre Cerveau et le Placer sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Details the 'Brain Horns' (Corne du Cerveau) as the fifth part of the Auto-Conscient Primitif, primarily consisting of optic nerves and retina, responsible for projecting psychic force. It explains how brain waves (Alpha, Beta, Delta, Theta, Gamma) are converted into four forms of energy/heat (radiant heat, infra-red rays, radio waves, corporeal magnetism) and projected outwards. Exercises are given to 'double the force of the photon' of these projections, specifically Infra-Red and Radio Rays, for healing, influencing others, and projecting thoughts.

structure_content.chapter_title: NEUVIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer Vos Réflexes Visuels et Auditifs sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Examines the 'Superior Colliculi' as the primary centers for visual reflexes and their role in physical agility, self-protection, and sports performance. It explains how to develop these reflexes to enhance vigilance, grace, and effectiveness in social and professional life. The lesson also covers the 'Inferior Colliculi' for auditory reflexes, showing how to develop hyper-acuity of hearing to perceive subtle sounds and react instinctively, similar to bats, and how to create a sense of security through auditory control.

structure_content.chapter_title: DIXIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer Votre Centre de Vue Primitive et Votre Grand Centre Visuel sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Describes the 'Primitive Vision Center' (external geniculate body) and 'Great Visual Center' (posterior cortex) as the seventh part of the Auto-Conscient Primitif, crucial for visual perception and recognition. It explains how to awaken the Primitive Vision Center to achieve 'four-eyed' vision, enabling faster reading and improved assimilation of complex information. It also details how to enhance the Great Visual Center to recognize colors, forms, and movements with artistic precision and practical advantage.

structure_content.chapter_title: ONZIÈME LEÇON: Comment Placer Votre Centre de l'Ouïe Primitive sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Focuses on the 'Primitive Auditory Center' (medial geniculate body) and the 'Electricity of the Cochlea' (Electricité du Limaçon) as the eighth part of the Auto-Conscient Primitif. It explores the cochlea's unique electrical properties and its role in hearing, distinct from nerve electricity. The lesson aims to develop 'hyper-acuity' of hearing, similar to a bat's radar sense, to detect distant sounds, improve social communication, and enhance appreciation of music. It explains how to use the 'Electricity of the Cochlea' for extraordinary auditory abilities.

structure_content.chapter_title: DOUZIEME LEÇON: Comment Utiliser l'Autoconscient Guérisseur pour Amener les Autres sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Introduces the 'Auto-Conscient Guérisseur' (Self-Conscious Healer) as a means of influencing others and providing psychic healing. It explains how to establish rapport and project healing energy through Infra-Red Rays and electron surplus via touch. The lesson details the 'Visualized Healed Organ' (Organe Guéri Visualisé) technique for specific healing, involving visualizing healthy organs and implanting them psychically into the affected area of another person. It underscores the importance of harmony and trust for effective psychic healing.

structure_content.chapter_title: TREIZIÈME LEÇON: Comment Réaliser ce qui Semble Impossible Grâce à Votre Electricité Corporelle et à Vos Antennes Cérébrales
structure_content.summary: Explores the creation of the 'Human Lamp' (Lampe Humaine) and the 'Antidromic Psychic' (Antidrome Psychique) method. It delves into the pseudo-scientific basis of bio-electricity and how to generate intense heat and light from the body by activating 'antidromic nerves' (nerves circulating against the usual current). The Antidromic Psychic is a technique to reverse nerve impulses and project powerful psychic commands, which are essential for creating the Human Lamp, demonstrating impossible feats of physical force, and influencing others.

structure_content.chapter_title: QUATORZIEME LECON: Comment Développer la Vision du Pouvoir Psychique et en Tirer d'Incroyables Avantages
structure_content.summary: Details the 'Psychic Power Vision' (Vision du Pouvoir Psychique) as the ninth part of the Auto-Conscient Primitif, enabling clairvoyance, X-ray vision, and microscopic/telescopic sight. It explains six methods to develop this vision, including varying eye lens convexity, globe convergence, and pupil size, and more advanced techniques like 'Astral Tube' usage and moving the eye lens/globe itself. The goal is to see through opaque objects, into the earth, and at great distances, discerning details clearly.

structure_content.chapter_title: QUINZIÈME LECON: Comment Développer l'Ouïe du Pouvoir Psychique et en Tirer des Avantages Prodigieux
structure_content.summary: Describes the 'Psychic Power Hearing' (Ouïe du Pouvoir Psychique) as the tenth and final part of the Auto-Conscient Primitif, linked to the auditory nerve and temporal lobe. It claims the ability to develop hyper-acuity of hearing far beyond normal limits, enabling the perception of distant or muffled sounds. The lesson details three steps to achieve this: increasing the auditory range of the 'Cochlea Electricity,' intensifying its function, and stimulating cochlear hair cells, effectively creating 'muscles for the ears' and overcoming auditory resistance.

structure_content.chapter_title: DIX-HUITIEME LECON: Comment Tirer des Connaissances Profitables du Monde Physio-Astral Grâce au Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique
structure_content.summary: Explores 'Physio-Astral' knowledge by contacting the 'Annals of the Earth' (Annales de la Terre), which are described as combined forms of physical, chemical, and mental activities imprinted in the ether. It distinguishes these from the Akashic Records. The lesson teaches how to 'attune' one's mind to these annals to access information about past and future events. It emphasizes using psychic power to 'feel' the molecular action of an object to extract its past history (psychometry) and to foresee the future through 'practical clairvoyance' and 'crystal gazing'.

structure_content.chapter_title: DIX-NEUVIEME LEÇON: Comment Utiliser les Secrets de la Domination du Pouvoir Psychique pour Contrôler les Autres Gens à Volonté
structure_content.summary: Focuses on achieving 'Psychic Domination' over others, which involves projecting psychic influence through the 'Astral Cone.' It explains how to create a 'Cone Aura' (Cône Aurai Evasé) that broadcasts one's desires to receptive individuals, attracting them and influencing their thoughts and actions. The lesson also introduces the 'Aural Helmet' (Casque Aural) as a defensive tool against psychic attacks and negative influences, protecting one's mind and controlling interactions.

structure_content.chapter_title: VINGTIEME LEÇON: Comment Placer le Monde Physio-Astral sous le Contrôle du Pouvoir Psychique et Acquérir un Pouvoir Miraculeux
structure_content.summary: Details the advanced techniques of 'Physio-Astral' control to achieve 'miracles.' This includes creating a 'Magic Image' (Image Magique) that others can perceive, materializing objects or animals from astral substance, achieving 'levitation' (both astral and physical), and maintaining permanent psychic control through the 'Psychic Mold.' It emphasizes the role of a 'tri-conscious cooperation' between the conscious, subconscious, and Auto-Conscient Primitif for supreme mastery and manifestation.

key_concepts.definition: The utilization of hidden psychic powers that all humans possess, enabling 'miracles' of healing, materialization, prophecy, thought transmission, and other astonishing feats. It is presented as a 'scientific' method to control inherent bio-electrical and molecular energies.

The 'instinctive prehistoric mind' or 'unknown personality' of an individual. It is composed of ten key brain centers responsible for psychic, sensory, muscular, and emotional control, which become dormant in modern humans but can be reawakened for extraordinary abilities.
The psychic power or faculty that controls the Auto-Conscient Primitif. It acts as the primary driver for all advanced psychic operations and self-mastery.
A concentrated mental impulse or thought-form, launched from the frontal brain, designed to transmit psychic orders to specific parts of the body or to external targets.

The 'hidden dynamite' within all living protoplasm (especially nerves), referring to its fundamental property of reacting to stimulation with an electrical current. This is the physiological basis for psychic command transmission.

A technique to reduce nerve junction resistance by thinking the opposite of a negative stimulation or situation. It is reinforced by psychic force to accelerate nerve impulse transmission and enhance mental clarity.

An intensified Psychic Arc that spreads throughout the entire nervous system, propagating an 'agreeable sensation' and stimulating 'loving nerves' to counteract negative emotions and their physical effects.

A method to suppress undesirable thoughts or impulses by allowing them briefly, then launching a powerful, opposing Psychic Arc that temporarily 'paralyses' the motor region of the brain, forcing the unwanted thought to dissipate.

Comprising the optic nerves and retina, this is one of the ten parts of the Auto-Conscient Primitif. It is specialized for projecting psychic force outward, converting brain waves into radiant heat, infra-red rays, radio waves, and corporeal magnetism.

A mental construct, an 'astral tube' formed in the ether or air, through which psychic messages or commands (composed of infra-red rays and radio waves) are channeled parallelly to a target, ensuring high intensity and accuracy over distance.

key_concepts.term: Ventouse Astrale Géante (Giant Astral Suction Cup)
key_concepts.definition: A psychic tool created from one's aura, used to forcefully 'aspirate' the astral body out of the physical body for astral projection.

key_concepts.term: Formes de Pensées Astrales Personnalisées (Personalized Astral Thought Forms)
key_concepts.definition: Psychic projections of oneself, created with intense visualization, that appear to others (visibly or invisibly) and can be used to influence their thoughts and actions, maintaining a conscious connection with the projector.
A projected psychic image, created by directing visual images from one's Great Visual Center onto another person's retina, making them 'see' what the projector visualizes.

key_concepts.term: Lévitation par la Magnétisation Renversée (Levitation by Reversed Magnetization)
key_concepts.definition: A method of levitation achieved by reversing the magnetic polarity of one's physical body to match the Earth's, causing the body to be repelled upwards. This requires deep psychic control over the body's subtle energies.

A permanent state of psychic control over the Auto-Conscient Primitif, achieved by subjecting Alpha and Beta brain waves to Delta and Theta control, and placing Cochlea Electricity under psychic auditory control. This keeps the Primitive Self-Conscious mind permanently awake and independent of conscious/subconscious interference.

practical_system.description: The Cyclomancy system is a comprehensive, operative framework for awakening and controlling the 'Auto-Conscient Primitif' – a dormant, instinctive mind located in specific brain centers. The core mechanics involve transmitting 'fusées-commandements' (psychic command missiles) – intensely visualized and willed mental impulses – to these centers or directly to targets. This is supported by various 'Psychic Arcs' (Psychic Arc, Irradiated, Delayed) to reduce neural resistance and amplify psychic force. Advanced techniques include projecting bio-electrical energies (Infra-Red and Radio Rays) via 'Brain Horns,' forming astral constructs like the 'Astral Tube' for remote influence, and even materializing objects or levitating. The system emphasizes overcoming internal resistance, cultivating unwavering confidence, and maintaining specific physiological states (e.g., alkalized blood, regulated breathing) to optimize psychic output. The ultimate goal is 'tri-conscious cooperation' to achieve complete self-mastery and external manifestation.
tools: Arc Psychique (Psychic Arc - regular, Irradiant, Différé)
Cornes du Cerveau (Brain Horns - optic nerves/retina)
Tube Astral (Astral Tube - channeled psychic projection)
Ventouse Astrale Géante (Giant Astral Suction Cup - for astral body separation)
Casque Aural (Aural Helmet - for psychic defense)
Demi-Cône Astral Tronqué (Truncated Astral Half-Cone - for X-ray vision)
Trompette Astrale (Astral Trumpet - for amplified astral hearing)
Moule Psychique (Psychic Mold - for permanent psychic control)
rituals: Placing your conscious mind, sensory and organ control centers under Psychic Power control (e.g., altering body temperature, weight, emotions, digestion) (Lessons 1-2)
Placing your muscle coordination center under Psychic Power control (e.g., enhancing strength, agility, grace) (Lesson 3)
Reducing nerve junction resistance using Psychic Arcs (regular, irradiant, delayed) (Lesson 4)
Placing nerve electricity under Psychic Power control for faster learning and personality development (Lesson 5)
Multiplying energy through Stimulating Respiration and Horizontal Ozona (deep breathing techniques) (Lesson 6)
Achieving perpetual non-fatigue by controlling muscle tone through Zembla Accroupi/Assis postures (Lesson 7)
Projecting Infra-Red Rays from Brain Horns for healing, attraction, and influencing others (Lesson 8)
Placing visual and auditory reflexes under Psychic Power control (e.g., enhancing visual acuity, developing hyper-hearing) (Lesson 9 & 10, 11 & 15)
Healing others and influencing them using the Self-Conscious Healer (e.g., projecting electron surplus, Visualized Healed Organs) (Lesson 12)
Creating the Human Lamp and Antidromic Psychic for generating light and reversing nerve impulses (Lesson 13)
Developing Psychic Power Vision for clairvoyance, X-ray vision, microscopic/telescopic sight (Lesson 14)
Obtaining profitable knowledge from the Physio-Astral World, including psychometry and clairvoyance of past/future events (Lesson 18)
Using Psychic Domination secrets to control others, creating an Astral Cone for influence and an Aural Helmet for psychic defense (Lesson 19)
Placing the Physio-Astral world under Psychic Power control for miracles, including Magical Image projection, Materialization, Astral Body travel, and Levitation (Lesson 20)

relevant_quotes.text: "Ce quelque chose n'est-il pas plus que de la fantaisie?"
"Il y a plus de choses dans les corps et les esprits des gens, mon fils, qu'il n'en a été rêvé dans toutes leurs sciences ".
La CYCLOMANCIE (un autre nom pour la Magie Blanche) est simplement l'utilisation de certains pouvoirs cachés que nous possédons tous.
Vous n'avez besoin que d'être 1/10 plus efficace qu'eux et ils ne pourront pas se comparer à vous.
La Coopération Tri-Consciente du maître psychique est de 109 à 3.000 fois plus parfaite que la vôtre.

critical_analysis.relevance: Frank Rudolph Young's 'Cyclomancy' is a significant text within the mid-20th century American 'mind power' and New Thought movements, often blending with esoteric and occult themes. It distinguishes itself by attempting to provide a pseudo-scientific, physiologically-based explanation for psychic phenomena, rooted in concepts like bio-electricity, protoplasmic irritation, and specific brain centers. While its terminology and mechanistic explanations deviate significantly from traditional Western Esoteric currents (e.g., Qabalah, Hermeticism, ceremonial magic traditions), its focus on individual willpower, visualization, and concentrated mental 'commands' (fusées-commandements) for practical results aligns with modern Chaos Magic principles of belief as a tool for reality manipulation. It can be seen as an early popularizer of operative techniques for self-transformation and external influence, albeit framed in a unique, almost materialist 'psychic science' rather than classical magical or spiritual frameworks. Its emphasis on a 'Primitive Self-Conscious' mind as the seat of power has parallels in some psycho-spiritual traditions that delve into deeper, instinctual layers of the psyche.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience for 'LA CYCLOMANCIE' is individuals seeking practical, step-by-step methods for self-improvement, psychic development, and exerting influence over others and their environment. It appeals to those interested in 'mind power,' self-mastery, and what are presented as 'miraculous' achievements, particularly those who prefer a 'scientific' or mechanistic explanation for psychic phenomena, rather than purely mystical or religious interpretations. The book is designed for practitioners who wish to enhance their health, wealth, social standing, and personal abilities through a systematic approach to unlocking latent psychic potential.
